allow: Bash(psql -U postgres -d cognitest -c "SELECT id, name, owner_id, created_at FROM organisations ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(alembic revision --autogenerate -m "Add test_plans, test_suites, and test_cases tables")

Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/v1/test-plans/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -d '{
    ""name"": ""User Authentication Test Plan"",
    ""description"": ""Test plan for user authentication features"",
    ""project_id"": ""84023b43-9f73-4079-b816-6eac57090e0b"",
    ""objectives"": [""Verify login flow"", ""Test password reset"", ""Validate session management""],
    ""tags"": [""authentication"", ""security""],
    ""created_by"": ""testuser@cognitest.ai""
}')

Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/v1/test-suites/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -d '{
    ""name"": ""Login Flow Test Suite"",
    ""description"": ""Tests for login functionality"",
    ""project_id"": ""84023b43-9f73-4079-b816-6eac57090e0b"",
    ""test_plan_id"": ""11e2878b-f26e-47f5-86b0-66d3a889c45a"",
    ""tags"": [""login"", ""authentication""],
    ""created_by"": ""testuser@cognitest.ai""
}')

Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/v1/test-cases/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -d '{
    ""title"": ""Test successful login with valid credentials"",
    ""description"": ""Verify that a user can successfully login with valid email and password"",
    ""project_id"": ""84023b43-9f73-4079-b816-6eac57090e0b"",
    ""test_suite_id"": ""d5b15cb9-a3e2-4987-a07a-eefff5c18279"",
    ""steps"": [
        {""step_number"": 1, ""action"": ""Navigate to login page"", ""expected_result"": ""Login form is displayed""},
        {""step_number"": 2, ""action"": ""Enter valid email"", ""expected_result"": ""Email field accepts input""},
        {""step_number"": 3, ""action"": ""Enter valid password"", ""expected_result"": ""Password field accepts input""},
        {""step_number"": 4, ""action"": ""Click login button"", ""expected_result"": ""User is redirected to dashboard""}
    ],
    ""expected_result"": ""User successfully logs in and sees the dashboard"",
    ""priority"": ""high"",
    ""tags"": [""smoke-test"", ""critical""],
    ""created_by"": ""testuser@cognitest.ai""
}')
